title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 279 - Practice On Review Of Hearings For Students With Disabilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 279 - Practice On Review Of Hearings For Students With Disabilities

State Regulations
§ 279.1 - Scope of Part
§ 279.2 - Notice of intention to seek review and notice of intention to cross-appeal
§ 279.3 - Notice of request for review
§ 279.4 - Initiation of review
§ 279.5 - Answer
§ 279.6 - Additional pleadings
§ 279.7 - Names of parties or attorneys to be endorsed on all papers and verification of pleadings
§ 279.8 - Pleadings and memoranda of law
§ 279.9 - Record of the proceeding before the impartial hearing officer
§ 279.10 - Rules of practice
§ 279.11 - Computation of days within which service must be made
§ 279.12 - Decision of State Review Officer
§ 279.13 - Limitation of time for initiation of appeal
§ 279.14 - Pre-review conference
§ 279.15 - Electronic Submissions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 279

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 101, 207, 301, 311, 3214, 4402[2], 4403, 4404, 4410;L. 1986, chs. 53, 273, 886

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
